alert.note: Alert for Polk; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 10:40PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern York and southeastern Polk Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1040 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Benedict to near Utica. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Gresham around 1055 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 362 and 365. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
